Text: To limit the effect of a protracted bear market in any one industry, I aim to keep the dividend income and portfolio value for each industry under 20%.
Cause: To limit the effect of a protracted bear market in any one industry
Effect: I aim to keep the dividend income and portfolio value for each industry under 20%.
Sentence: <e1>To limit the effect of a protracted bear market in any one industry</e1>, <e2>I aim to keep the dividend income and portfolio value for each industry under 20%.</e2>
